data.title: Riola Exotriple,, exosomes (100mg+6ml)
data.meta_description: Riola Exotriple,, exosomes (100mg+6ml)  | Mesotherapy \ Hydration of the skin Mesotherapy \ Tissue stimulators Tissue stimulators Mesotherapy \ Skinbooster | Opis towaru w meta zmienisz w dziale MODERACJA \ SEO
data.text:
Riola Exotriple is a rejuvenating complex that visibly nourishes the skin, giving it strength and radiance. The unique formula that combines CICA EXOSOME, PDRN and collagen completely rebuilds damaged skin, reduces wrinkles, reduces inflammation and gives the skin an incredible glow. Additionally, the formula has been enriched with a peptide complex that visibly lifts the skin and makes it look younger. Riola Exotriple is the highest quality stem cell enhancer that will give your skin self-confidence.

Effects of use:

Skin regeneration

Brightening and whitening

Anti-aging

Anti-inflammatory effect

Antioxidant

Improved flexibility

Main ingredients:

CICA exosome - contains various acids necessary for the regeneration of skin cells, collagen synthesis, gives the skin elasticity, prevents aging, prevents acne and inflammation. It makes the skin healthy from the inside.

PDRN - (derived from wild Alaskan salmon) perfectly supports and increases skin hydration and reconstructs damaged skin. Strengthens the skin's antioxidant barrier and visibly reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and age spots.

collagen - allows filling of shallow wrinkles and significant correction of deep ones, and also ensures an optimal level of skin hydration.

peptides - influence the synthesis of collagen and elastin, improve skin tone, accelerate healing and repair processes, influence the synthesis of the extracellular matrix and smooth wrinkles.

How to use:

Insert the PDRN 2 solvent ampoule into the Exosome 1 ampoule. Shake it to completely dissolve the lyophilized Exosome. The product should be injected intradermally. Riola Exotriple must not be used on injured skin, eczema or dermatitis. The depth of the needle should be adjusted to the thickness of the skin and the place of application. It must be set at an angle of 0.2 to <1 mm.

Can be used once every two weeks.

Packaging:

1 vial x 100 mg No. 1 Exosome (lyophilized ampoule)

1 vial x 6 ml No. 2 PDRN + Collagen + Peptides (ampoule with solvent)
